alert.note: Alert for Carroll (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 6:25AM CDT until April 05 at 6:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BENTON AND NORTHWESTERN CARROLL COUNTIES... At 625 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Beaver, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Berryville... Eureka Springs... Gateway... Beaver... Urbanette... Grandview... Pleasant Ridge... Beaver Lake... Oak Hill... Busch... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for northwestern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
